expo.name: KIKU - Child Safety
expo.description: Global child safety platform protecting children from cyberbullying, harassment, and online dangers with AI-powered monitoring and parental controls.

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: KIKU needs microphone access to analyze voice messages for safety threats and inappropriate content.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: KIKU uses your location only during SOS emergencies to help parents locate their child quickly.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: KIKU uses your location only during SOS emergencies to help parents locate their child quickly.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: KIKU uses your location only during SOS emergencies to help parents locate their child quickly.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: KIKU needs camera access to allow image sharing which is then analyzed for safety.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: KIKU needs photo library access to allow image sharing which is then analyzed for safety.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: KIKU can access contacts to help you add trusted contacts to your child's whitelist.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: KIKU does not track you for advertising. This is only for safety monitoring.
